name: Xerztodon
description: My custom CSS tweaks for Mastodon: black, Noto Sans, and more!
additional_info:
- the style has been only tested on mstdn.io and mastodon.social but should work on any up-to-date instance
- the theme is yet to be properly adapted for small displays like phones
